showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “What's with you!?
You make me sick!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // “You're a real freakazoid,
aren't you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // “I'm still in here!
All right!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “I've heard there's a snow woman
at the Great Glacier
that hates hot springs…”{PAUSE}“But I think it's
just a myth to scare off visitors.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Do you know what a Cetra is?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “What were the Cetra?
Oh yeah, they were
the same as the Ancients, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Yeah, a Cetra lived in this town
a long time ago.”{PAUSE}“Her name was Ifalna, and
she knew about a lot of things…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “I heard she was abducted by the Shinra and
was taken somewhere.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Shinra and the Ancients…
I smell somethin' fishy…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “With all the strange things
happening in the world,
I kinda understand
why people want to leave…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Do you know what a Cetra is?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “What were the Cetra?
Oh yeah, they were
the same as the Ancients, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “Yeah, a Cetra lived in this town
a long time ago.”{PAUSE}“Her name was Ifalna, and
she knew about a lot of things…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “I heard she was abducted by the Shinra and
was taken somewhere.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Shinra and the Ancients…
I smell somethin' fishy…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “Maybe we'd better
leave town soon too.”{PAUSE}“Let's go to that island in the South!
What was it called?”{PAUSE}“Yeah, yeah, I heard that there's a town
called Mideel on a southern island.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “I heard some guy went to
the Great Glacier in the North.”{PAUSE}“What an idiot.
Is he thinkin' 'bout going to
that hot spring?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “He's probably gonna get lost in
the glacier and freeze to death.”{PAUSE}“No matter how well equipped he is,
out there in that cold on the glacier,
I give him two days at the most.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Well…if you're going past this town
you'll need a map.”{PAUSE}“Maybe there's one left at
Mr. Holzoff's house.
He used to be a mountain climber.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // “Yeah, we really don't have anything
here, but make yourself at home.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “If you go further North,
I heard there's a Huge Crater.”{PAUSE}“Something huge must've fallen
from the sky a long time ago!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // “Welcome!
You look like a STRONG one…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // “What's with you!?
You make me sick!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // “I got bored
listening to his stories.”

dialogStrings: Icicle Inn Bar

“I've heard there's a snow woman
at the Great Glacier
that hates hot springs…”{PAUSE}“But I think it's
just a myth to scare off visitors.”
“Do you know what a Cetra is?”

“Yeah, a Cetra lived in this town
a long time ago.”{PAUSE}“Her name was Ifalna, and
she knew about a lot of things…”

“I heard she was abducted by the Shinra and
was taken somewhere.”

“With all the strange things
happening in the world,
I kinda understand
why people want to leave…”

“What were the Cetra?
Oh yeah, they were
the same as the Ancients, right?”
“Whadaya mean?”

“Shinra and the Ancients…
I smell somethin' fishy…”

“Maybe we'd better
leave town soon too.”{PAUSE}“Let's go to that island in the South!
What was it called?”{PAUSE}“Yeah, yeah, I heard that there's a town
called Mideel on a southern island.”

“I heard some guy went to
the Great Glacier in the North.”{PAUSE}“What an idiot.
Is he thinkin' 'bout going to
that hot spring?”

“He's probably gonna get lost in
the glacier and freeze to death.”{PAUSE}“No matter how well equipped he is,
out there in that cold on the glacier,
I give him two days at the most.”

“You thinkin' of going North?”
{CHOICE}That's my plan
{CHOICE}No

“Well…if you're going past this town
you'll need a map.”{PAUSE}“Maybe there's one left at
Mr. Holzoff's house.
He used to be a mountain climber.”

“Yeah, we really don't have anything
here, but make yourself at home.”

“If you go further North,
I heard there's a Huge Crater.”{PAUSE}“Something huge must've fallen
from the sky a long time ago!”
“Am I boring you?”

“Welcome!
You look like a STRONG one…”

“If you want,
I could lend you an ear?”
{CHOICE}Yeah
{CHOICE}Not interested

“What's with you!?
You make me sick!”

“I got bored
listening to his stories.”
“Oh yeah?”
“WHAT YOU LOOKIN' AT!?”

“You're a real freakazoid,
aren't you?”
“Eyaaaaaaaaah!!!”

“I'm still in here!
All right!?”
